meanings.definition: A frozen dessert made from fruit juice, sugar, and water.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a refreshing sherbert on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent2: My favorite flavor of sherbert is orange.
meanings.sent3: The sherbert danced in my mouth with its fruity sweetness.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a scoop of sherbert, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the sherbert made it irresistible.

meanings.definition: A powder used to make a sweet, fizzy drink.
meanings.sent1: We mixed the sherbert powder with water to create a delicious beverage.
meanings.sent2: The sherbert powder added a burst of flavor to the soda.
meanings.sent3: The sherbert powder clouded the air as we tried to mix it in.
meanings.sent4: His excitement bubbled up like a spoonful of sherbert powder.
meanings.sent5: The sherbert powder sparkled like magic as it dissolved in the liquid.
